Judge Berman has scheduled a  final conference in the Epstein case at which he will allow victims to be heard before 
dismissing the case. A number of victims would like to attend, but they are unable to afford travel costs. May we have 
approval for to pay for flights and hotels for victims who wish to attend the conference but otherwise cannot 
afford the cost? 
EFTA00032892
